verses.roman:
bhakta-gaṇa śīghra āsi' laila prabhura sātha
vastra-prasāda lañā tabe āilā gopīnātha

synonyms: bhakta-gaṇa—devotees; śīghra—very swiftly; āsi'-coming; laila—took; prabhura—of the Lord; sātha—the company; vastra—the garments; prasāda—and Lord Jagannātha's prasāda; lañā—with; tabe—thereafter; āilā—came; gopīnātha—Gopīnātha Ācārya.
translation: Immediately all the devotees came and partook of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu's company. Afterwards, Gopīnātha Ācārya came with the garments and prasāda.
